title: Wakakusa Monogatari: Nan to Jo-sensei
alternative_title: Little Women II: Jo's Boys, 若草物語ナンとジョー先生, Sekai Meisaku Gekijou, Ai no Wakakusa Monogatari II, Little Men
description: Nan Harding is the new student at Mr. and Mrs. Bhaer's school. Everyone thinks that she is a pain in the head, but not Mrs. Jo. Together with the other kids, they all embark on their personal adventures and misfortunes while learning in school.
genre: [<Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Historical>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
